original: Dahlman, Bengt Vilhelm, överingenjör, Göteborg, f. 23/6/94 i Sthlm av bildhugg. Johan Wilhelm D. o. Hilma Amanda Herrström. G. 20 m. Maja Larsson. Barn: Lars-Olov f. 21, Birgit 22, Sven 38. — Ex. v. KTH 20. Stud :res. t. Finl., Norge, Danm., Tyskl., Hodl., Schweiz o. Engl. Kemist o. driftsing. v. A-B Kem. Fabr. lon i Sthlm 18-20, v. Avesta Sulfat o. Trä-varu A-B 20, assist, v. stat. provn:-anst. i Sthlm 21, ing. v. Sthtos gasv. 21, v. Sv. gasv:fören. 27, övering. v. Malmö gasv. 31, v. Gbgs dito sed. 40. Led. av styr. f. Sv. gasvrfören. sed. 35, v. ordf. 37-39 samt sed. 43, ordf. 40-42, led. av styr. f. Gas- o. koksverkens ekon. fören. sed. 39, led. av styr. f. Gbgs Vedinköps A-B sed. 42. RVO.
translated: Dahlman, Bengt Vilhelm, senior engineer, Gothenburg, born June 23, 1894 in Stockholm to sculptor Johan Wilhelm D. and Hilma Amanda Herrström. Married Maja Larsson in 1920 and had three children: Lars-Olov, born 1921, Birgit, born 1922, and Sven, born 1938. Graduated from KTH (Royal Institute of Technology) in 1920. Studied abroad in Finland, Norway, Denmark, Germany, Holland, Switzerland and England. Worked as a chemist and operation engineer at AB Kemisk Fabrik in Stockholm from 1918 to 1920, Avesta Sulfate and Wood Products AB in 1920, assistant at the Swedish State Proving Ground in Stockholm in 1921, engineer at Sthtos gasworks in 1921, at the Swedish Gas Association in 1927, senior engineer at Malmö gasworks in 1931, and at Gothenburg gasworks from 1940 onward. He was a member of the board of Swedish Gas Works Association from 1935, chairman from 1937 to 1939 and from 1940 to 1942, and also held executive positions in Gas and Coke Works Economic Association and Gothenburg Wood Purchase AB. He was awarded the Order of Vasa.

hasOccupation.name: Avesta Sulfate and Wood Products AB

memberOf.name: Gas and Coke Works Economic Association
